author: Choo Han Teck J:
casenumber: High Court — Suit No 920 of 2019 (Registrar’s Appeal No 98 of 2020)
casename: Yuen Minglan Helga Mrs Minglan Helga Alle (executrix of the estate of Mrs Yuen Ingeborg Nee Santjer, deceased) v Ng Yung Chuan Sean and others
